suggest.flarum/flags: Allow users to flag posts for moderator review.
suggest.flarum/lock: End a discussion and don't let anyone add further replies.
suggest.flarum/mentions: Mention and reply to specific posts and users.
suggest.flarum/pusher: See new discussions and posts in real-time using Pusher.
suggest.flarum/sticky: Pin discussions to the top of the list.
suggest.flarum/subscriptions: Allow users to follow discussions and receive notifications for new posts.
suggest.flarum/tags: Organize discussions into a hierarchy of tags and categories.
